SetupIntentUsage

@Serializable
enum SetupIntentUsage : Enum<SetupIntentUsage> , Serializable

Indicates how the payment method is intended to be used in the future.

Entries

ON_SESSION
Link copied to clipboard
@SerialName(value = "on_session")
ON_SESSION

Use if you intend to only reuse the payment method when the customer is in your checkout flow.

OFF_SESSION
Link copied to clipboard
@SerialName(value = "off_session")
OFF_SESSION

Use if your customer may or may not be in your checkout flow.
